question: The energy associated with first orbit in He<katex>$^+$</katex> is
explanation: Energy of electron in orbit n of hydrogen-like species is <katex>$E_n = -2.18 \times 10^{-18} (Z^2/n^2) \ J$</katex>. For He+, Z=2, n=1. <katex>$E = -2.18 \times 10^{-18} \times 4 = -8.72 \times 10^{-18} \ J$</katex>.
